name: Shoot. Push. Repeat.
summary:
This fun and dynamic clicker puzzle game will not leave anyone indifferent! You have to deliver the blue ball to the desired point using only the laws of physics!
The game is a worthy successor to the Oik series, taking only the best from it.
A huge number of various puzzles will not leave anyone indifferent!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 休闲
  • 游戏引擎: Clickteam Fusion 2.5
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020-6-8
  • 售价: ￥6
  • 开发商: Crew Lab
  • 发行: Crew Lab
